original_text: So I went to the governors of Trans-Euphrates and gave them the king’s letters. The king had also sent army officers and cavalry with me.
korean_text: 군대 장관과 마병을 보내어 나와 함께 하게 하시기로 내가 강 서쪽에 있는 총독들에게 이르러 왕의 조서를 전하였더니

sentences.original_text: So I went to the governors of Trans-Euphrates
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 투그라티스 강 건너편 총독들에게 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and gave them the king's letters.
The king had also sent army officers
